channel.title: Kootenai County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Kootenai County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 North - Exit 449
item.description: US-95 north approaching Exit 449 - ID-54/Athol/Bayview. Use Exit 449 for Farragut State Park.

item.title: US-95 North - Exit 446
item.description: US-95 north approaching Exit 446 - Brunner Road/Bunco Road. Use Exit 446 for Silverwood theme park.

item.title: US-95 North - Exit 442
item.description: US-95 north approaching Exit 442 - Chilco Road/Ohio Match Road. This is the beginning of new US-95 alignment north of Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: US-95 North - Northwest Blvd. West
item.description: US-95 North at Northwest Blvd. West. Use Northwest Blvd. for Post Falls and for I-90 (West). Continue north on US-95 for Sandpoint, Canada and I-90 (East).

item.title: US-95 North - Northwest Blvd. East
item.description: US-95 North at Northwest Blvd to Downtown Coeur d’Alene. Continue north on US-95 for Sandpoint.

item.title: US-95 North - ID-58 Junction
item.description: US-95 North at ID-58 Junction. Use ID-58 for Spokane and CdA (Coeur d’Alene) Casino and Resort.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-58
item.description: US-95 south approaching new ID-58 interchange. ID-58/Spokane/Tribal Casino.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd.
item.description: US-95 south at Northwest Blvd. to City Center. Continue south on US-95 for Moscow. Northwest Blvd. used to be BL-90.

item.title: US-95 South at I-90
item.description: US-95 south at I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane. Approaching I-90 east to Kellogg. Continue on US-95 south for Moscow and Lewiston.

item.title: ID-41 South at I-90 - Interstate Trucks
item.description: ID-41 south approaching I-90. All Interstate trucks must be weighed at Port of Entry on I-90 East.

item.title: Jct. I-90 on ID-41 South
item.description: ID-41 south approaching I-90.

item.title: Northwest Blvd. at I-90 West
item.description: Northwest Blvd. west at I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: Northwest Blvd. at I-90
item.description: Northwest Blvd. west at I-90 east to Kellogg and Missoula. Approaching I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd.
item.description: US-95 south offramp at Northwest Blvd east to City Center and west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd.
item.description: US-95 south offramp at Northwest Blvd east to City Center and west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd. Exit
item.description: US-95 south at Northwest Blvd. to Post Falls.

item.title: US-95 South at Lincoln Way
item.description: US-95 south approaching Lincoln Way.

item.title: US-95 North at ID-54
item.description: US-95 north at ID-54 west to Spirit Lake and east to Bayview.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north to Athol, Sandpoint, and Canada.

item.title: US-95 North At ID-53 West
item.description: US-95 north at ID-53 west to Rathdrum.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-53
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-53 west.

item.description: ID-3 north at ID-97 north to Harrison.

item.description: ID-3 north approaching ID-97 north.

item.title: End ID-58 East at US-95
item.description: End ID-58 east at US-95 north to Coeur d’Alene and south to Plummer and Moscow.

item.description: Begin ID-58 west at US-95.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching ID-58
item.description: US-95 north approaching ID-58 west to Rockford and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 11 and 12
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 11 - City Center/Northwest Blvd. Approaching Exit 12 - US-95/Sandpoint/Moscow.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 11 - Northwest Blvd./City Center.

item.description: Post Falls exits on I-90 east - Spokane St. and Jct. ID-41.

item.title: I-90 West - Idaho
item.description: I-90 West Idaho shield just east of Exit 2. This is the only I-90 shield with the word "Idaho" in it on the freeway.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 2
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 2 - Pleasant View Road. This is the last Idaho exit on I-90.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 6 - BL-90/Seltice Way/City Center.

item.description: Post Falls exits on I-90 west. Next three exits: Seltice Way, Spokane St., and Pleasant View Road.

item.title: I-90 West - Exits 7 and 6
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 7 - ID-41/Rathdrum/Spirit Lake. Approaching Exit 6 - BL-90/Seltice Way/City Center.

item.title: I-90 West - Post Falls Exits
item.description: Post Falls exits on I-90 West - Next 3 exits, Jct. SH-41, Seltice Way, and Spokane St.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 11 - Northwest Blvd.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 12 - US-95/Sandpoint/Moscow. Approaching Exit 11 - Northwest Blvd.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 12
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 12. Use Exit 12 for US-95 north to Canada.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 13 - 4th St. Approaching Exit 12 - US-95/Sandpoint/Moscow.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 14 - 15th St. Approaching Exit 13 - 4th St.

item.description: End ID-3 north at I-90 east to Kellogg and Missoula.

item.description: I-90 east at Exit 34 - ID-3/Rose Lake/Harrison/St. Maries.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 34 - ID-3/Harrison/St. Maries/Rose Lake.

item.description: I-90 east at Exit 22 - ID-97/Harrison.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 22 - Wolf Lodge District
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 22. Use Exit 22 for Wolf Lodge District.

item.description: I-90 east crossing Wolf Lodge Bay of Lake Coeur d’Alene.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 22 - ID-97/Harrison.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 17 - Mullan Trail Road.

item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 15 - Sherman Ave./Fernan.

item.description: I-90 east at Exit 14 - 15th St. Approaching Exit 15 - Sherman Ave.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 13 and 14
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 13 - 4th St. Approaching Exit 14 - 15th St.

item.title: US-95 North at I-90 East
item.description: US-95 north at I-90 east to Kellogg. US-95 north continues to Sandpoint, and I-90 west to Spokane.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-90
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-90 Exit 12 interchange.

item.title: Jct. I-90 on US-95 North
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-90 jct.

item.title: US-95 South at I-90 East
item.description: US-95 south at I-90 east to Kellogg. US-95 south continues to City Center and Moscow.

item.title: US-95 South at I-90
item.description: US-95 south at I-90 west onramp (Exit 12). Use I-90 west for Post Falls and Spokane. Use I-90 east for Kellogg and US-95 south for Moscow and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching I-90
item.description: US-95 south approaching I-90. For I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane use right lane.

item.title: US-95 South at ID-53
item.description: US-95 south at ID-53 west to Rathdrum.

item.title: ID-54 West at US-95
item.description: ID-54 west at US-95 north to Sandpoint and south to Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-54 West Approaching US-95
item.description: ID-54 west approaching US-95.

item.title: ID-54 West in Farragut State Park
item.description: ID-54 west at right turn. Turn right to continue on ID-54 towards Athol, Sandpoint, and Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-54 West - Smylie Blvd
item.description: ID-54 West - Smylie Blvd. Logo next to ID-54 is for Idaho Parks and Recreation.

item.title: End ID-54 East
item.description: End ID-54 East in Bayview. Lake Pend Oreille is in the background.

item.title: ID-54 East - Smylie Blvd.
item.description: Smylie Blvd. on ID-54 east.

item.title: ID-54 East at Farragut SP Traffic Circle
item.description: ID-54 east at a roundabout in Farragut State Park. Through traffic stay to the right towards Bayview. West bound ID-54 traffic towards Athol stay left.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching ID-54
item.description: US-95 south approaching ID-54 jct.

item.title: End ID-54 West at ID-41
item.description: End ID-54 west at ID-41. Use ID-41 north for Spirit Lake and Newport (WA). Use ID-41 south for Rathdrum.

item.title: ID-41 North at ID-54
item.description: ID-41 north at ID-54.

item.title: ID-41 North Approaching ID-54
item.description: ID-41 north approaching ID-54 east to Athol.

item.title: ID-53 East at ID-41
item.description: ID-53 east at ID-41 junction. ID-53 east traffic turns right here. ID-41 north traffic continue straight.

item.title: ID-53 East Approaching ID-41
item.description: ID-53 east approaching ID-41/ID-53 to Sandpoint and ID-41 north to Spirit Lake and Newport (WA).

item.title: WA-290 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-290 west. Taken at the Idaho-Washington border.

item.title: Begin ID-53 - Idaho/Washington Border
item.description: Begin ID-53 west at the Washington-Idaho border.

item.description: I-90 east Exit 34 offramp at ID-3 to Rose Lake and St. Maries.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 34, ID-3/Rose Lake/St. Maries/Harrison.

item.description: I-90 west at Exit 34 offramp at ID-3 south to Rose Lake and St. Maries.

item.title: I-90 West Exit 39
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 39, Old Mission State Park.

item.title: I-90 West Exit 40
item.description: I-90 at Exit 40, Cataldo.

item.title: I-90 West For Cataldo Mission Use Exit 39
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 39, Old Mission State Park. Cataldo Mission Historic Landmark, next right.

item.title: ID-3 South at I-90 East Onramp
item.description: ID-3 south to Rose Lake and St. Maries at I-90 east to Kellogg.

item.title: ID-3 South at ID-97
item.description: ID-3 south at ID-97 north to Harrison.

item.title: ID-97 North - Lake Coeur d'Alene Scenic Byway
item.description: Lake Coeur d’Alene Scenic Byway at beginning of ID-97 north. Uses new style of scenic byway marker.

item.title: BL-90 West at US-95
item.description: BL-90 West at US-95. US-95 north goes through Coeur d’Alene to I-90.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 2
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 2 - Pleasant View Road. This is the first exit in Idaho on I-90 East.

item.title: I-90 East Exit 7
item.description: I-90 East at Exit 7 - ID-41/Rathdrum/Spirit Lake

item.title: I-90 Onramp at Exit 17
item.description: I-90 freeway entrance at I-90 Exit 17 - Mullan Trail Road. I-90 east to Missoula and Kellogg, and west to Coeur d’Alene.

item.title: ID-3 North - Kootenai County
item.description: Entering Kootenai County on ID-3 North

item.title: ID-97 North - Lake Coeur d'Alene Scenic Byway
item.description: Lake Coeur d’Alene Scenic Byway on ID-97 North. The Lake Coeur d’Alene Scenic Byway follows ID-97 from ID-3 north to I-90 along the east shore of Lake Coeur d’Alene.
